abstract: United Nations reports that torture and abuse of prisoners arrested in Afghanistan's war remains widespread there, illustrating challenges faced by Afghan government as it works to eliminate torture.
lead_paragraph: A report on the torture and mistreatment of people arrested for conflict-related activities points to a continued challenge for the new government.

headline.main: Prisoner Abuse Still Widespread in Afghanistan, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: Prisoner Abuse Still Widespread in Afghanistan, U.N. Says

snippet: A report on the torture and mistreatment of people arrested for conflict-related activities points to a continued challenge for the new government.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
